question: Forest areas have been labelled as 1, 2, 3 and 4 in the rough outline map given: Among these, those which were threatened in 1997 by a serious epidemic include
option2: oaks forests of 1 and sal forests of 2
explanation: Sal forest of Madhya Pradesh indicates ‘3’ in the given India map. In 1997 Sal forest were badly affected by the insects which cause destruction of Sal forest by turning the trees dry.
